name: Jurassic Parkour (Fox and Lion Games)
description:
Welcome, to Jurassic Parkour.

Play as Kora, an egg hunting raptor who needs to collect every egg in order to move to on. She's always moving but you control when she jumps. There are 4 levels to make it though, all while being timed! They are open and encourage different paths to find the most efficient route.

Your fastest time will be stored and displayed in the main menu.

======CONTROLS======

Left Mouse Button or Space to jump

=======CREDITS======

All assets were made for and within the jam timeline.

Jeff Minbiole - Code - Sound - Design

Lily Minbiole - Art - Sound - Design
